text: This may refer to: *Baron Bruce of Anandale (1295), a subsidiary title for the Earl of Carrick, abeyant 1371 *Baron Bruce of Whorlton (1641), formerly a subsidiary title for the Earl of Elgin and Kincardine, extinct 1747 *Baron Bruce of Skelton (1664), formerly a subsidiary title for the Earl of Ailesbury, extinct 1747 *Baron Bruce of Tottenham (1746), a subsidiary title for the Marquess of Ailesbury
title: Baron Bruce
